pages.text: Emus are neutral birds that can be found in the Badlands and Savannas.$(br2)Emus can be attracted and breed with Wheat.$(br2)They can lay Large Blue Eggs, can be used like common eggs and can be used to cook a Boiled Emu Egg too.$(br2)On death they may drop common Feathers or Emu Feathers too.
The last ones can be used to get an special Pattern and $(l:patchouli:armors/outback_leggings)Outback Leggins$(/l) too.
